name: ics460sockets
description: 1. Install node 2. run `npm i @socketsupply/socket -g` 3. run `ssc build && ssc run` in this repo

scripts.start: xcopy /E /Y src\ dist\ && tsc -p . && ssc build && ssc run
scripts.peer: xcopy /E /Y src\ peer\src\ && cd peer && npm run start
scripts.peer2: xcopy /E /Y src\ peer2\src\ && cd peer2 && npm run start
scripts.triplet: concurrently "npm run peer" "npm run peer2" "npm run start"
